name: DeBuggers (MightyJor)
description:
DeBuggers - by Mightyjor - Made for GMC Jam 49

How to Play:

- Left mouse click moves the trapper.

- Position your Trappers in a way that the bug cannot escape. 

- If the Bug reaches the exit, you lose.

- On levels with a trap symbol, you'll need to trap the bugs specifically on those spaces.

- There are 6 levels total

Additional debug controls:

N - go to next level

R - restart level

F - Fullscreen (or alt+enter)

Escape - Pause

DEVELOPER NOTES:

Initial concept of the game is based on a 19th century french strategy game called Hare and Hounds. I recently saw a fake game facebook ad that took this concept and made it 3 police versus a robber and it looked like fun, but of course the game was fake so I couldn't play it without sitting through hours of garbage game content. So I decided to make my own version of it, and I've managed to work in bugs and a bunch of bug trappers in order to fit within the theme of the jam.
